channel.title: RSCD v_25 compile/ Run server
channel.description:
With other sources it was a simple change java PATH: to my java files what not same with ant..
for some reason it wont compile and cant get the sever up even locally..
bascailly my only question when i edit the .bat files for rscd for run server compile and run client etc what format do i edit them into. doesnt seem to be same as was when i did a demonik.. =| yes im noob on this kinda stuff but meh. I never claimed to not be with this lmao

item.title: RSCD v_25 compile/ Run server

item.description:

compiler problems are easy to fix,

item.title: RSCD v_25 compile/ Run server
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

@echo off
set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07
ant_server -buildfile .\build.xml
pause

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD v_25 compile/ Run server
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

omg another compile problem…

just put this for your compile

@echo off
set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07
ant -buildfile .\build.xml
pause

Just set the java and path to what you got.

Read full topic
